get.description: Retrieves a list of appointments.

post.description: Creates a new appointment with associated locations, services, and attendees.

get.description: Retrieve details of a single appointment.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the appointment to retrieve

put.description: Updates an existing appointment with new details.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the appointment to update

delete.description: Deletes an existing appointment by ID.

post.description: This endpoint allows a user to log in using their email and password. A valid token is returned upon successful authentication.
This endpoint allows a user to register by providing their name, email, password, and other required details.
This endpoint allows an authenticated user to log out by revoking their issued tokens.

message.example: Unauthorized - Token not provided or invalid

get.description: Fetches details of the currently authenticated user.

get.summary: Get a user in a specific workspace along with services and locations
get.description: Returns user details only if the user is part of the workspace, including related services and locations.

post.description: Creates a client, user, and appointment under a workspace.

get.description: Retrieves a list of clients within a workspace.
Retrieve details of a specific client by ID.

delete.description: Deletes a client based on the given ID.

get.summary: Get all invoices for the current workspace
get.description: Fetches all invoices associated with the currently authenticated user's active workspace.

post.description: Creates a new invoice with services, calculates the subtotal and payable amount including taxes.

get.summary: Get a specific invoice by ID
get.description: Retrieves a single invoice by ID, scoped to the current user's workspace. Includes a tax summary if available.

put.description: Updates an existing invoice with new service details and recalculates the subtotal and payable amount.

delete.description: Deletes the specified invoice by its ID. If the invoice doesn't exist, a 404 response will be returned.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the invoice to be deleted

patch.description: Marks the specified invoice as paid by updating its `is_paid` field. If the invoice doesn't exist, a 404 response will be returned.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the invoice to mark as paid
